eprosima::rpc::strategy::SingleThreadStrategy

eprosima::rpc::strategy::SingleThreadStrategy Class Reference
[Strategies]

This class implements the sigle thread strategy. The server uses a reception thread to execute all the requests. More...

Detailed Description

This class implements the sigle thread strategy. The server uses a reception thread to execute all the requests.
